readable.title: 3377344932_6dfce93248
readable.content: A dog is at the top of a blue slide and a little boy is behind him . A dog is running onto the top of a blue slide . A yellow dog leads a child in going down a blue slide . A yellow lab descends a slide , while a mother in a red sweater and a child in a black shirt play with a brown dog . dog coming down a slide from a wooden playhouse
